ModMetaData.name: Scenario Pawns and Corpses - Fixed
ModMetaData.author: Kayesh
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds a couple of new scenario customization options:
1.) The ability to add corpses to the map, whether as starting corpses that arrive with the colonists, nearby corpses, or corpses scattered across the map. Corpses for tool-using pawn types will spawn with dropped equipment, such as weapons and meals. 2.) The ability to specify pawn childhood and adult backstories. Can specify multiple backstories with a max total chance of 100% per slot.
A couple of example scenarios have been added.
